DOC.brief_summary: The CVRx® Rheos® Diastolic Heart Failure Trial prospective , randomize , double blind trial 60 subject conduct five center Europe . All subject follow one year post implant .
DOC.criteria: Be least 21 year age . Have bilateral carotid bifurcation level mandible . Have leave ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 45 % . Clinical Heart Failure elevate BNP NTProBNP . History suspect baroreflex failure autonomic neuropathy . History symptomatic bradyarrhythmias , pericardial constriction , infiltrative cardiomyopathy , cardiac valvular disease . Organ hematologic transplant . History prior surgery , radiation , stent placement carotid sinus region . History severe chronic kidney disease . Life expectancy less one year .
